If anyone continues to post on the subject of factions and stuff OOC, I'll have rAuq kneecap them. Now, for the (hopefully) final commant on this:

First of all: Soulstice, that was just plain cheap. Its threats like those that make people not want people's chars in their faction. "If you do this, I'll kill off my chars on your side" is exactly what makes faction commanders begin to rely on your chars less and less, resulting in them being ignored.

Second of all: as Gunthers said, quit trying to predict what the Alliance is gonna do. You're all wrong so far anyways.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: I did a poll. Want to vote in it? All I'm saying is that if there is an alliance, all of my Chivtrons are going to die. I didn't really want that, though...
